products.name: Xbox One 500GB Console with Kinect - Microsoft Refurbished
products.shortDescription: * Microsoft Certified Refurbished. SAVINGS reflect a comparison price to a $499.99 non-refurbished Xbox One + KinectThe Xbox One console with Kinect and wireless controller is an all-in-one entertainment powerhouse that takes your games, live TV, movies, sports, and music to a whole other level. Using cutting-edge hardware, Xbox One has the power and performance to play hit games, as well as the ability to switch between multiple

products.name: Nintendo Wii U 32GB Super Mario 3D World Deluxe Set
products.shortDescription: Enjoy Nintendo classics and exciting new games on the Wii U Deluxe Super Mario 3D World. This 32GB Wii U Console and Wii U GamePad features stunning graphics in up to Full HD resolution, the ability to browse the Internet and connect with other Wii U owners and share Mii characters with people around the world.

products.name: Xbox One 500GB Assassin's Creed Unity Bundle
products.shortDescription: • Experience the immersive gameplay and incredible graphics of Xbox One with this Xbox One Console Bundle with Assassin's Creed Unity and Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. This all-in-one entertainment console connects you to your favourite games, TV shows, live events, as well as your friends, family and fellow gamers. Assassin's Creed Unity digital code can only be activated on November 11.

products.name: Amiibo Meta Knight Figure
products.shortDescription: Kirby's mysterious rival is Meta Knight, a masked swordsman whose giant cape transforms into wings and who captains his giant battleship, the Halberd, in an attempt to take control of Dream Land. Tap Meta Knight over your Wii U GamePad to open up new experiences with each corresponding Super Smash Bros. game.

products.name: PlayStation 4 500GB The Last of Us Remastered Bundle
products.shortDescription: Enjoy amazing entertainment with this Last of Us Remastered PS4 bundle. Join Joel and 14-year-old Ellie, two seemingly opposite characters, who must work together to survive a brutal journey across a plague-torn United States filled with threats from the military, hostile survivors, and the Infected.

products.name: PlayStation 4 500GB Destiny Bundle - White
products.shortDescription: The PS4 Destiny Bundle comes with the exclusive content you need to achieve legendary status, like multiplayer maps, strike missions, and an expanded weapons arsenal. As a Guardian of the last city on Earth, you'll form a Fire Team with friends to explore the ancient ruins of the solar system and defeat those that threaten our planet.

products.name: PlayStation 3 500GB NHL 15 Bundle With Uncharted 1 & 2
products.shortDescription: Experience the sights, sounds and feel of the fastest team sport around or explore an immersive uncharted world with this PlayStation 3 bundle. It includes a copy of NHL 15 as well as Uncharted 1: Drakeâ€™s Fortune, and Uncharted 2: Among Thieves as downloadable games.

products.name: Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask Limited Edition (Nintendo 3DS)
products.shortDescription: Experience Link's suspenseful, intricate quest on a hand-held device for the first time. The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D features enhanced 3D graphics and added features for a smoother game experience.

products.name: Xbox One 500GB Assassin's Creed Unity Bundle with Kinect
products.shortDescription: Experience the immersive gameplay and incredible graphics of Xbox One with this Xbox One Console Bundle with Kinect, Assassin's Creed Unity and Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. This all-in-one entertainment console connects you to your favourite games, TV shows, live events, as well as your friends, family and fellow gamers.

products.name: amiibo Super Smash Bros Pit Figure (NVLCAAAS)
products.shortDescription: Looking to take your gaming to another level? amiibo character figures let you open up new experiences for your game. Just tap your amiibo on the Wii U gamepad and the figure will come alive and interact with the compatible game in surprising ways. Your amiibo stores your game data as you play, letting you customize your character and gameplay.

products.name: Xbox One Wireless Controller
products.shortDescription: Experience the action like never before with the Xbox One Wireless Controller. New Impulse Triggers deliver fingertip vibration feedback, so you can feel every jolt and crash in high definition.* It features redesigned thumbsticks and an all new D-pad provide greater precision. And the entire controller fits more comfortably in your hands. With over 40 innovations, it's simply the best controller Xbox has ever made.

products.name: Collective Minds Xbox One Media Hub
products.shortDescription: Expand your hard drive storage and console's media access with the Collective Minds USB Hub and Hard Drive Enclosure. When attached to your Xbox One console, the hub lets you expand your gaming frontiers and charge your controllers with ease on three conveniently located USB ports.

products.name: Xbox 360 500GB Call of Duty Bundle
products.shortDescription: Experience a gaming console where you don't just play the game, you are the game. This Xbox 360 has a leaner look and sleek finish, as well as built-in WiFi to connect you to a world of entertainment on Xbox Live. It's Kinect-ready to put you right in the action and features a spacious hard drive for all your favourite games and movies.

products.name: Halo Master Chief Collection (Xbox One)
products.shortDescription: This epic re-mastering of Halo: Master Chief Collection gives you the most immersive and jaw-dropping Halo experience yet. It includes Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo 2 Anniversary, Halo 3, and Halo 4. Get ready for 1080p and 60 frames per second of killer gaming!

products.name: The Legend Of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D (Nintendo 3DS)
products.shortDescription: Experience Link's suspenseful, intricate quest on a hand-held device for the first time. The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D features enhanced 3D graphics and added features for a smoother game experience.

products.name: PlayStation 4 500GB NHL 15 / LittleBigPlanet 3 Bundle
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite games, movies, and more with this PlayStation 4 gaming console. It offers rich gameplay, powerful graphics, integrated social capabilities, and innovative features that make the most of your entertainment.

products.name: Super Smash Bros (Nintendo Wii U)
products.shortDescription: Super Smash Bros comes to Wii U and brings some familiar faces into the fold. At long last, Megaman joins the ranks and brings his arsenal of special attacks into the fray. Villager from Animal Crossing has also been added to the game's roster and will surely make for some interesting battles between you and your friends as you compete for glory across colourful battle grounds new and old.

products.name: Nintendo Wii U GameCube Super Smash Bros. Controller
products.shortDescription: Bash, brawl, and battle your way through your favourite games with this Super Smash Bros. Edition Wii U GameCube controller. It allows you to enjoy a host of Wii U games with the GameCube-style controls you know and love. Enjoy the nostalgia of the Super Smash Bros. franchise with this themed design.

products.name: Xbox 360 4GB Holiday Value Bundle
products.shortDescription: The Xbox 360 Slim is still your ticket to the best possible gaming experience. Only now, with a 4GB hard drive, built-in Wireless N, and compatibility with Microsoft Kinect, it's even better than ever.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Console
products.shortDescription: The Sony PlayStation 4 takes gaming and home entertainment to a whole new level. The super-charged hardware, which includes an incredibly powerful graphics engine, Blu-ray drive and Super-speed USB 3.0, creates a platform for an entertainment experience that'll blow you away.

products.name: Far Cry 4 Limited Edition (PlayStation 4)
products.shortDescription: In Far Cry 4, players find themselves in Kyrat, a breathtaking, perilous and wild region of the Himalayas struggling under the regime of a despotic self-appointed king.  Using a vast array of weapons, vehicles, and animals, players will write their own story across an exotic open-world landscape.

products.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Day Zero Edition (PlayStation 4) - English
products.shortDescription: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Day Zero Edition envisions the powerful battlegrounds of the future, where both technology and tactic have evolved to usher in a new era of combat. Kevin Spacey stars as Jonathan Irons - one of the most powerful men in the world and key figure in shaping this chilling vision of the future of war.

products.name: PlayStation TV
products.shortDescription: The PlayStation TV is a slim and compact gaming console that brings a universe of PlayStation games to your fingertips. It's ideal for using as a second console for PS4 remote play and streaming PS3 games from PlayStation Now.

products.name: Grand Theft Auto V (Xbox One)
products.shortDescription: Los Santos: a sprawling sun-soaked metropolis full of self-help gurus, starlets and fading celebrities is now struggling to stay afloat in an era of economic uncertainty and cheap reality TV. Amidst the turmoil, three very different criminals risk everything in a series of daring and dangerous heists that could set them up for life.

products.name: Nintendo 3DS XL - Black
products.shortDescription: With the Nintendo 3DS XL, bigger will always be better. The dual screens are 90% larger than the original 3DS, while the upper one can display your games with cool 3D visuals without needing special glasses to see them.

products.name: Playstation TV Bundle
products.shortDescription: The PlayStation TV bundle is a slim and compact gaming console that brings a universe of PlayStation games to your fingertips. It's ideal for using as a second console for PS4 remote play and streaming PS3 games from PlayStation Now.

products.name: Xbox One Midnight Forces Controller (J72-00017)
products.shortDescription: Enhance your gaming fun with this Xbox One Special Editions Midnight Forces Wireless Controller. Each jolt and crash will be enhanced by fingertip vibration feedback thanks to Impulse Triggers, while precision and comfort come courtesy of redesigned thumbsticks and D-pad enhancements.

products.name: LittleBigPlanet 3 Limited Edition (PlayStation 4)
products.shortDescription: Sackboy is back for a huge handcrafted adventure in LittleBigPlanet 3. Joined by new friends Toggle, Oddsock and Swoop, he must save his weird and wonderful world from the evil Newton. This exciting game is full of endless creativity with something new around every corner.

products.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Day Zero Edition (Xbox One) - English
products.shortDescription: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Day Zero Edition envisions the powerful battlegrounds of the future, where both technology and tactic have evolved to usher in a new era of combat. Kevin Spacey stars as Jonathan Irons - one of the most powerful men in the world and key figure in shaping this chilling vision of the future of war.

products.name: PlayStation Gold Wireless Stereo Headset
products.shortDescription: Take your gaming experience up a notch with the PlayStation Gold Wireless Stereo Headset. Designed especially for the PlayStation 4, this headset boasts 7.1 virtual surround sound to immerse you in all the audible action of any game. A noise-cancelling microphone keeps you connected to virtual allies and enemies, while the eight-hour battery life keeps up with long gaming sessions.

products.name: amiibo Super Smash Bros Ike Figure (NVLCAABA)
products.shortDescription: Looking to take your gaming to another level? amiibo character figures let you open up new experiences for your game. Just tap your amiibo on the Wii U gamepad and the figure will come alive and interact with the compatible game in surprising ways. Your amiibo stores your game data as you play, letting you customize your character and gameplay.

products.name: Middle Earth: Shadow Of Mordor (PlayStation 4)
products.shortDescription: Talion, Ranger of the Black Gate, watched over Mordor for generations of peace, but in one brief moment his family, friends, and life were taken from him. You must inhabit his vengeful spirit and embark on a ruthless quest for revenge. Discover the truth behind the spirit that resurrected Talion, uncover the origins of the Rings of Power, and confront the evil Sauron.
